responses: What can I do for you?
I am DragonFruit_Kumar, your virtual assistant at Circo's
Circo's was founded in 2003 with the idea of spreading the taste of authentic pizza to every household
We are open 24/7, except on public holidays. You are welcome anytime!
We sell a large variety of pizzas. You can get the full menu at menu.com/circo

patterns: how much do your pizzas cost
how much will i spend here?
responses: Our pizzas range from $1 to $9. We also offer discounts, know more at circo.com/discounts
